problems.title: Word Break
problems.description:
Given a string s and a dictionary of words (space-separated), determine if s can be segmented into a space-separated sequence of one or more dictionary words. The same word in the dictionary may be reused multiple times in the segmentation. Print "true" if possible, otherwise print "false".

Input Format:
First line contains string s.
Second line contains space-separated dictionary words.

Output Format:
Print "true" if word break is possible, otherwise print "false".
problems.examples:
Sample Input
leetcode
leet code

Sample Output
true

Sample Input
applepenapple
apple pen

Sample Output
true

Sample Input
catsandog
cats dog sand and cat

Sample Output
false

Explanation:
"leetcode" can be segmented as "leet code". "applepenapple" can be segmented as "apple pen apple".
problems.constraints:
1 <= length of s <= 300
1 <= number of words <= 1000
1 <= length of each word <= 20

testCases.input:
catsandog
cats dog sand and cat

hintsList: Use dynamic programming. dp[i] represents if substring s[0..i-1] can be segmented. For each position, check if any word from dictionary matches and if the remaining part can be segmented.
